forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 68, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West wind 10 to 16 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 52. West wind 6 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon brings a delightful caress of sunlight, painting the city in soft hues as the current temperature hovers near a gentle 68 degrees. The skies are remarkably clear, allowing for unimpeded views of the bridges and hills, with only the faintest suggestion of the marine layer lingering beyond the horizon. As the day unfolds, expect temperatures to gradually retreat to around 64 degrees, accompanied by a crisp west wind that whispers quietly through the streets, creating a refreshing atmosphere ideal for a leisurely stroll.

This evening promises not only clarity but a soothing transition into a cool, mostly clear night, with the thermometer dipping around 52 degrees. The winds may intensify, gusting up to 26 mph, adding a playful edge to your evening plans. As such, a light jacket or sweater will serve as a perfect companion for an outing, whether you choose to explore the waterfront or savor a cozy meal at a local eatery. With the charm of this clear afternoon, the city invites a gentle adventure—perhaps a visit to a hidden café or a quiet park where you can revel in the lingering warmth before nightfall envelops the landscape.
